description: Detects active RDP sessions on a Windows system, reports session details, and flags sessions idle for longer than a configurable threshold. Outputs NDJSON with session metadata, flagged sessions, and relevant audit data, writing atomically to the Active Response log with .new fallback if locked.

script_parameters.name: IdleThresholdMinutes
script_parameters.description: Number of idle minutes after which RDP sessions are flagged.

script_parameters.name: LogPath
script_parameters.description: Path to the rotating human-readable script log.

script_parameters.name: ARLog
script_parameters.description: Active Response NDJSON output path (atomic overwrite; falls back to .new if locked).
